text: James Albert Murray (July 5, 1932 â€“ June 5, 2020) was an American prelate of the Roman Catholic Church. He was Bishop of Kalamazoo from 1998 to 2009. He was born in Jackson, Michigan. Murray died on June 5, 2020 in Kalamazoo, Michigan at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== *Roman Catholic Diocese of Kalamazoo Official Site *Catholic-Hierarchy *Biography on Diocese of Kalamazoo site *USCCB Office of Media Relations Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Jackson, Michigan Category:People from Kalamazoo, Michigan
title: James Albert Murray
